5#ifndef V8_DEOPTIMIZER_FRAME_TRANSLATION_BUILDER_H_
6#define V8_DEOPTIMIZER_FRAME_TRANSLATION_BUILDER_H_
7
8#include "src/codegen/register.h"
9#include "src/deoptimizer/translation-opcode.h"
10#include "src/objects/deoptimization-data.h"
11#include "src/zone/zone-containers.h"
12
13#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
14#include "src/wasm/value-type.h"
15#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
16
17namespace v8 {
18namespace internal {
19
20class LocalFactory;
21
22class FrameTranslationBuilder {
23 public:
24 explicit FrameTranslationBuilder(Zone* zone)
25 : contents_(zone),
26 contents_for_compression_(zone),
27 basis_instructions_(zone),
28 zone_(zone) {}
29
30 Handle<DeoptimizationFrameTranslation> ToFrameTranslation(
31 LocalFactory* factory);
32 base::Vector<const uint8_t> ToFrameTranslationWasm();
33
34 int BeginTranslation(int frame_count, int jsframe_count,
35 bool update_feedback);
36
37 void BeginInterpretedFrame(BytecodeOffset bytecode_offset, int literal_id,
38 unsigned height, int return_value_offset,
39 int return_value_count);
40 void BeginInlinedExtraArguments(int literal_id, unsigned height);
41 void BeginConstructCreateStubFrame(int literal_id, unsigned height);
42 void BeginConstructInvokeStubFrame(int literal_id);
43 void BeginBuiltinContinuationFrame(BytecodeOffset bailout_id, int literal_id,
44 unsigned height);
45#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
46 void BeginJSToWasmBuiltinContinuationFrame(
47 BytecodeOffset bailout_id, int literal_id, unsigned height,
48 base::Optional<wasm::ValueKind> return_kind);
49 void BeginWasmInlinedIntoJSFrame(BytecodeOffset bailout_id, int literal_id,
50 unsigned height);
51 void BeginLiftoffFrame(BytecodeOffset bailout_id, unsigned height);
52#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
53 void BeginJavaScriptBuiltinContinuationFrame(BytecodeOffset bailout_id,
54 int literal_id, unsigned height);
55 void BeginJavaScriptBuiltinContinuationWithCatchFrame(
56 BytecodeOffset bailout_id, int literal_id, unsigned height);
57 void ArgumentsElements(CreateArgumentsType type);
58 void ArgumentsLength();
59 void RestLength();
60 void BeginCapturedObject(int length);
61 void AddUpdateFeedback(int vector_literal, int slot);
62 void DuplicateObject(int object_index);
63 void StoreRegister(TranslationOpcode opcode, Register reg);
64 void StoreRegister(Register reg);
65 void StoreInt32Register(Register reg);
66 void StoreInt64Register(Register reg);
67 void StoreSignedBigInt64Register(Register reg);
68 void StoreUnsignedBigInt64Register(Register reg);
69 void StoreUint32Register(Register reg);
70 void StoreBoolRegister(Register reg);
71 void StoreFloatRegister(FloatRegister reg);
72 void StoreDoubleRegister(DoubleRegister reg);
73 void StoreHoleyDoubleRegister(DoubleRegister reg);
74 void StoreStackSlot(int index);
75 void StoreInt32StackSlot(int index);
76 void StoreInt64StackSlot(int index);
77 void StoreSignedBigInt64StackSlot(int index);
78 void StoreUnsignedBigInt64StackSlot(int index);
79 void StoreUint32StackSlot(int index);
80 void StoreBoolStackSlot(int index);
81 void StoreFloatStackSlot(int index);
82 void StoreDoubleStackSlot(int index);
83 void StoreHoleyDoubleStackSlot(int index);
84 void StoreLiteral(int literal_id);
85 void StoreOptimizedOut();
86 void StoreJSFrameFunction();
87
88 private:
89 struct Instruction {
90 template <typename... T>
91 explicit Instruction(TranslationOpcode opcode, T... operands)
92 : opcode(opcode),
93 operands{operands.value()...}
94#ifdef ENABLE_SLOW_DCHECKS
95 ,
96 is_operand_signed{operands.IsSigned()...}
97#endif
98 {
99 }
100 TranslationOpcode opcode;
101 // The operands for the instruction. Signed values were static_casted to
102 // unsigned.
103 uint32_t operands[kMaxTranslationOperandCount];
104#ifdef ENABLE_SLOW_DCHECKS
105 bool is_operand_signed[kMaxTranslationOperandCount];
106#endif
107 };
108
109 // Either adds the instruction or increments matching_instructions_count_,
110 // depending on whether the instruction matches the corresponding instruction
111 // from the previous translation.
112 template <typename... T>
113 void Add(TranslationOpcode opcode, T... operands);
114
115 // Adds the instruction to contents_, without performing the other steps of
116 // Add(). Requires !v8_flags.turbo_compress_frame_translations.
117 template <typename... T>
118 void AddRawToContents(TranslationOpcode opcode, T... operands);
119
120 // Adds the instruction to contents_for_compression_, without performing the
121 // other steps of Add(). Requires v8_flags.turbo_compress_frame_translations.
122 template <typename... T>
123 void AddRawToContentsForCompression(TranslationOpcode opcode, T... operands);
124
125 // Adds a BEGIN instruction to contents_ or contents_for_compression_, but
126 // does not update other state. Used by BeginTranslation.
127 template <typename... T>
128 void AddRawBegin(bool update_feedback, T... operands);
129
130 int Size() const {
131 return V8_UNLIKELY(v8_flags.turbo_compress_frame_translations)
132 ? static_cast<int>(contents_for_compression_.size())
133 : static_cast<int>(contents_.size());
134 }
135 int SizeInBytes() const {
136 return V8_UNLIKELY(v8_flags.turbo_compress_frame_translations)
137 ? Size() * kInt32Size
138 : Size();
139 }
140
141 Zone* zone() const { return zone_; }
142
143 void FinishPendingInstructionIfNeeded();
144 void ValidateBytes(DeoptTranslationIterator& iter) const;
145
146 ZoneVector<uint8_t> contents_;
147 ZoneVector<int32_t> contents_for_compression_;
148 // If match_previous_allowed_ is false, then this vector contains the
149 // instructions written so far in the current translation (since the last
150 // BEGIN). If match_previous_allowed_ is true, then this vector contains the
151 // instructions from the basis translation (the one written with
152 // !match_previous_allowed_). This allows Add() to easily check whether a
153 // newly added instruction matches the corresponding one from the basis
154 // translation.
155 ZoneVector<Instruction> basis_instructions_;
156#ifdef ENABLE_SLOW_DCHECKS
157 std::vector<Instruction> all_instructions_;
158#endif
159 Zone* const zone_;
160 // How many consecutive instructions we've skipped writing because they match
161 // the basis translation.
162 size_t matching_instructions_count_ = 0;
163 size_t total_matching_instructions_in_current_translation_ = 0;
164 // The current index within basis_instructions_.
165 size_t instruction_index_within_translation_ = 0;
166 // The byte index within the contents_ array of the BEGIN instruction for the
167 // basis translation (the most recent translation which was fully written out,
168 // not using MATCH_PREVIOUS_TRANSLATION instructions).
169 int index_of_basis_translation_start_ = 0;
170 // Whether the builder can use MATCH_PREVIOUS_TRANSLATION in the current
171 // translation.
172 bool match_previous_allowed_ = true;
173};
174
175} // namespace internal
176} // namespace v8
177
178#endif // V8_DEOPTIMIZER_FRAME_TRANSLATION_BUILDER_H_
